about.title: About Me
description: üéì Education: Cao ƒë·∫≥ng C√¥ng Th∆∞∆°ng (Industrial College).

Hello! I am a passionate Web Developer with a love for creativity and building tech solutions. With hands-on experience in both Frontend & Backend development, I'm always seeking opportunities to apply and enhance my skills in a professional environment.

I aspire to join a dynamic tech company where I can apply my knowledge and experience to create quality products. At the same time, I aim to continuously learn and grow to become an expert in the Web development field.
